DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate preventive vaccine efficacy , safety , tolerability ALVAC-HIV vaccine + Bivalent Subtype C gp120 protein adjuvanted MF59 HIV-seronegative South African adult 24 month enrollment . Participants randomize receive ALVAC-HIV ( vCP2438 ) , placebo , intramuscular injection week 0 4 ; receive ALVAC-HIV ( vCP2438 ) + Bivalent Subtype C gp120/MF59 , placebo , IM injection week 12 , 24 , 52 . In addition vaccination visit , participant attend study visit week 26 , 39 , 54 , 65 , 78 , 91 , 104 , 117 , 130 , 142 , 156 . All study visit , include vaccination visit , include HIV risk reduction counseling , physical exam , interview/questionnaire . pregnancy test participant capable become pregnant . Select study visit include medical history review , physical exam , blood collection , urine collection , HIV testing , pregnancy test participant capable become pregnant .
